statements: UPDATE composers SET birth_year=1800, nationality='German' WHERE composer_id=1;
UPDATE composers SET major_works='Symphony No. 5' WHERE composer_id=2;
UPDATE composers SET composer_name = 'Johann Sebastian Bach', nationality = 'German', major_works = 'Brandenburg Concertos' WHERE composer_id = 1;
UPDATE composers SET birth_year = 1770, major_works = 'Symphony No. 9 (Choral)' WHERE composer_name = 'Ludwig van Beethoven';
UPDATE composers SET composer_name = 'Ludwig van Beethoven' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE major_works SET year_published = 1824, work_title = 'Symphony No. 9' WHERE composer_id = 1;
UPDATE composers SET composer_name = 'Beethoven' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE major_works SET work_title = 'Symphony No. 9' WHERE composer_id = 1 AND year_published = 1824;
UPDATE Composers SET birth_year = 1756, death_year = 1791 WHERE composer_id = 1;
UPDATE MajorWorks SET release_year = 1800 WHERE work_id = 5;
UPDATE Composers SET birth_year = 1800, death_year = 1890 WHERE composer_id = 1;
UPDATE MajorWorks SET release_year = 1850 WHERE work_id = 10;
UPDATE composers SET birth_year = 1800 WHERE composer_id = 1;
UPDATE works SET genre = 'Baroque' WHERE work_id = 3;
UPDATE composers SET birth_year = 1800, death_year = 1900 WHERE composer_id = 1;
UPDATE performances SET venue = 'New Venue', performance_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE performance_id = 3;
UPDATE composers SET nationality='Austrian' WHERE composer_id=1;
UPDATE works SET genre='Classical', composed_date='1785-01-27' WHERE work_id=2;
UPDATE composers SET death_date = '1943-05-14', nationality = 'German' WHERE composer_id = 3;
UPDATE works SET genre = 'Baroque' WHERE composed_date < '1700-01-01';
